Tod, this does look very similar (but not quite the same) as bug 53291.  Can 
you verify if this is a dup?
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 53291 ***

This bug was marked as a duplicate of Bug 53291, but I have never seen the 
stack trace for Bug 53921.  I did, however, just see this exact same exception 
on shutdown. 
 
I200406180010. 
 
Re-opening the bug.  If you still feel this bug is a duplicate of Bug 53291, 
please re-open that bug and mark this as a duplicate of Bug 54257 again.
This dialog needs to also be migrated to the jobs mechanism in 3.1.

I have not seen this problem since.  I believe that this problem just reflects 
a lack of robustness in the code, rather than a real problem.  Fixing it might 
fit in the theme of "built to last".  :)
haven't seen this for some time
I just saw this problem again.
